name: Moss Step (3rd Alakajam!)
description:
The main mechanic of this game is that you can't go to the same spot twice. Why not? Because everywhere you go, poisonous moss grows!

There are three difficulties to choose from. Here's what each difficulty setting does:

Easy: moss only grows beneath you. Not on walls or ceilings.

Normal: Moss grows everywhere that you touch.

Hard: Almost the same as normal mode, except if you touch one side of a block, the entire block gets covered in moss, instead of just the side you touched.

There are 20 levels in the game. I wanted to make about 10  more, but didn't have enough time. Sorry!

Also, for some reason I decided to make it look like you were playing on a kind of GameBoy ripoff. There is absolutely no reason for this. I just did it. 

Anyways, I hope you enjoy the game!  Happy Jamming to all. :O

PS: SAVING WILL BE ADDED POST-JAM

and a quick edit: fixed a part of the end screen where the text overlapped. :<
